name: 885 CAP
description: The cap rocks a bold 885 embroidered on the front, set against a sleek, structured design. With a curved bill and adjustable strap, it’s perfect for adding a street vibe to any outfit.

name: MR. BEANIE
description: This cool brown beanie exudes a laid-back vibe, crafted from soft, cozy knit fabric that offers warmth and comfort. Its slouchy fit and ribbed texture give it a stylish edge, making it a versatile accessory that pairs effortlessly with any casual outfit.

name: STARTOP
description: The cap features a trendy star print all over, adding a playful touch to its classic silhouette. Made from lightweight fabric, it has a structured crown and a curved bill, perfect for keeping the sun at bay while making a bold fashion statement.

name: RADIATORZ
description: These cool shades sport a bold, oversized frame with a sleek, reflective lens that screams attitude. With a design that’s both edgy and urban, they feature thick arms adorned with subtle branding, making them the perfect accessory for a ghetto-inspired street style look.

name: ON-CROSS
description: This necktie features a sleek design with a distinctive cross pendant that hangs stylishly from the tip. Made from high-quality fabric, the tie has a smooth finish and a subtle sheen, adding a touch of elegance while the cross adds a bold, meaningful accent to any formal or casual outfit.

name: FLEUR CROSS CHAIN
description: This chain showcases two striking crosses, each intricately designed and hanging from a sturdy metal link. Crafted from durable materials, the chain exudes a bold and edgy vibe, making it a standout accessory that adds a touch of faith and style to any outfit.

name: SH4RPLINK
description: This chain features sharp, angular links that create a bold, industrial look, giving it an edgy and contemporary vibe. The high-polish finish enhances the sharpness of the links, making it a striking accessory that can elevate any outfit, whether casual or formal.

name: WORKTIE
description: A simple neck-tie for you. Just know how to tie a tie.

name: TOUCH O' FLAIR
description: The BB belt is a sleek, stylish accessory that adds a touch of flair to any outfit. With its bold buckle and high-quality material, it’s perfect for cinching the waist on dresses or pairing with jeans. Whether you’re going for a casual look or something more polished, this belt effortlessly elevates your style.

name: THOSE EYES
description: These flashy shades are all about making a statement. With their bold colors and reflective lenses, they instantly add a touch of glam to any outfit. Perfect for blocking out the sun or just turning heads, they’re the ideal accessory for a standout look.

name: LOCKEDHEART
description: The LOCKEDHEART chain is a bold and stylish accessory that combines strength and elegance. Crafted with interlocking links, it features a unique heart-shaped lock charm that adds a romantic touch. Perfect for layering or wearing solo, this chain makes a statement and captures a sense of individuality.
